I understand that you're feeling concerned about your spending habits, John. It's important to take a closer look at your financial situation to ensure you're on track to achieve your goals of retiring comfortably and leaving an inheritance.

Given your current income, savings, and investments in stocks and bonds, you have a solid foundation to work with. To better understand your spending habits, I recommend tracking your expenses to see where your money is going. This will help you identify areas where you can potentially cut back and save more for your future.

Creating a budget can also be a helpful tool in managing your finances. By setting limits on different spending categories and prioritizing your financial goals, you can make more informed decisions about where your money should go.
